aboutus.title: About Us
aboutus.hero_text: We bring quality technology at fair prices since 2015. We believe everyone deserves access to the latest technology products.
aboutus.story_text1: TechShop was founded in 2025 with a clear vision - to make modern technology accessible to everyone. We started as a small online shop with a few products and today we offer thousands of products from world-renowned brands.
aboutus.story_text2_prefix: Over the years, we have gained the trust of more than
aboutus.story_text2_suffix: in Slovakia. We constantly strive to improve our services and provide the best solutions for our customers.
aboutus.story_text3: Our company is certified and all products come from verified sources with full warranty and support.
aboutus.values_item1_desc: TechShop began with a simple goal: make modern technology accessible to everyone.
aboutus.values_item2_desc: Fast and reliable support for our customers.
aboutus.team_text: TechShop is backed by a team of professionals with years of experience in IT and electronics. Our experts are ready to advise you on product selection and provide technical support.
aboutus.team_cta_text: We're looking for new team members. Check out our open positions on the careers page.
aboutus.partners_text: We are authorized resellers of premium brands:
aboutus.mission_text: Our mission is to be the most trusted electronics store in Slovakia. We want technology shopping to be simple, secure and enjoyable. We believe in long-term relationships with our customers built on trust and quality.
aboutus.cta_text: Don't hesitate to contact us. We're happy to tell you more about our company and our values.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1_text: TechShop s.r.o. (hereinafter referred to as "we" or "company") respects your right to privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This document explains what data we collect, how we use it, and what rights you have regarding the protection of your personal data under GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation).
